com.tomzhu.heap

Class BasicArrayHeap<E extends java.lang.Comparable<E>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tomzhu.heap.BasicArrayHeap<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - the type of element

    public class BasicArrayHeap<E extends java.lang.Comparable<E>>
extends java.lang.Object
    a simple heap implementation based on array which can be max heap or min heap.
    Since:
    1.7
    Author:
    tomzhu

        public static <T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>> BasicArrayHeap buildHeap(T[] eles,
                                                                           BasicArrayHeap.HeapType heapType)
        building a heap using data within O(N) time.
        Type Parameters:

        Parameters:

      • isMaxHeap

        public boolean isMaxHeap()

        whether this heap is a max heap

      • isMinHeap

        public boolean isMinHeap()

        whether this heap is a min heap

      • insert

        public void insert(E ele)
        insert an element to this heap.
        Parameters:
        ele -

      • getMax

        public E getMax()
        Returns:
        the max element of this heap, only supports BasicArrayHeap.HeapType.MAXHEAP. return null if is empty or is a min heap.

      • getMin

        public E getMin()
        Returns:
        the min element of this heap. only supports BasicArrayHeap.HeapType.MINHEAP. return null if is empty or is a max heap.

      • removeMin

        public E removeMin()
        remove the min element from this heap and return. return null if is max heap or isEmpty.
        Returns:
        the min element.

      • removeMax

        public E removeMax()
        return the max element from this heap and return. return null if is min heap or isEmpty.
        Returns:
        the max element

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        Returns:
        the size of current heap

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Returns:
        whether this heap is empty.
